boy.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: a male child, or a male person in general
boy.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: The boys wanted to play football.
What a polite little boy (=young male child) you are.
Come on, Timmy, act like a big boy (=an older boy) now.
A group of teenage boys stood talking in a group outside.
‘You naughty boy!’ she said in a harsh voice.
boy.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: I love my boys, but I’d like to have a girl, too.
How old is your little boy (=young son)?
boy.translation[0].definitions[2].defini: a way of talking to a male horse or dog
boy.translation[0].definitions[3].defini: an offensive way of talking to a black man
boy.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: used when you are excited or pleased about something
boy.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: Boy, that was a great meal!
boy.translation[2].definitions[0].defini: beginning of year; used in documents when talking about the beginning of a financial year
